channel.title: What the hell?
channel.description: When i try to go here on firefox, it just wolnt let me at all, ive been trying foir the past 5 hours..Jesus what is with this?

item.title: What the hell?
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:3, topic:15900”]Mopar was down last night, I do not know for how long, but that may be the problem. It was white.

The outdoors won’t hurt you.[size=10pt]By following my instructions you agree that I am not responsibility for any injury that may occur if you follow my instructions.[/size][/quote]
Lol Un-Named, I almsot missed that until I highlighted your message (its a habit) I quoted you just to see if it was some kind of glitch (since the quote shows you all tags, messages etc. And saw it. You may not have seen the extra message that is in this quote of Un-Named, but it was in his message, the size was just at 1pt and the message was colored white, so it would be camouflaged. :P. I brought it up to normal size.
The last sentence of his message looked like the following sentence (quote me if you cant read it):

[size=1pt]I like pie a lot.If this sentence offedns you just let me know and Ill change the exmaple sentence.[/size]

If you want to see the sentence at its original size (being viewed without the use of a quote message), just highlight it and youll see a few dots. Those are the letters. If you want to know what it says, quote me and read the message before you psot the quote.

Read full topic
